lines.text: There's no hay here! Just the haywires! He must have come here to steal the hay!
The wizard must've set it all on fire to keep the nefarious Grass Bandit from getting his grubby mitts on it! It's the only possible explanation!
...Well. That thing about hay burning <c=#FF00FF>might be important later,</c> but...
But that was totally stupid, yeah.
